articles.description: If it weren't for a bogey at the final hole, Justin Thomas would hold the course record at The Players Championship.
articles.content:
Justin Thomas improved 16 shots from the first round to the second at The Players Championships, which is the best jump in the event's history. (Jeff Swinger-Imagn Images)
